data.title: Amusement Park in Raleigh, NC
data.meta_description: Come have a blast with a full-sized trampoline park, go-karts, laser tag, birthday parties, and more! We are Raleigh, NC's number one amusement park!
data.text:
Over 65,000 sq. ft. of Indoor Entertainment!

CLOSED-TOED SHOES & WAIVER REQUIRED!

Unlimited Special Pricing - Click Here

Individual Attraction Pricing - Click Here

Jump Zone Pricing - Click Here

Friday Special - All Access - Click Here

Our advertised pricing is for cash sales. When paying, you will be presented with a choice between the discounted cash price or the price for your chosen form of payment, which may reflect an additional cost.

SUMMER HOURS START

WEDNESDAY, JUNE 12th, 2024

Monday-Tuesday- CLOSED

Wednesday-Thursday-10am-8pm

Friday-Saturday-10am-9pm

Sunday-Noon-8pm

IMPORTANT NOTICES

CLOSED-TOED SHOES & WAIVER REQUIRED

Live the Adventure

The ultimate laser adventure that is serious fun for all ages.

Gravity Can't Get You Here

The fun for all ages Trampoline Park lets you play in a way you never could before.

Wide Open Throttle

Check out the Premier Go-Karting experience at Galaxy Speedway

Hold On!

Feel the thrill of dangling from the ropes stories above the ground with our Spacewalk Ropes Course

Let Them Roam

Enjoy a little adult time by relaxing while your kids play in the safety of the Mission Control Station

I'm Seeing Stars!

Jump into the Orbital Spin Zone and relish in the crazy spins twists and pivots of these unique bumper cars

Birthday Parties!

Give them a gift they can't forget! We have complete birthday packages that your kids will love!

CLOSED TOED SHOES REQUIRED
